name: Adam Kinzinger
summary: Former Republican Congressman and Air Force officer who served on the January 6 Committee and became one of Trump's most vocal GOP critics, endorsing Kamala Harris in 2024.

keyStatements.quote: Donald Trump is a weak man pretending to be strong. He is a small man pretending to be big. He's a faithless man pretending to be righteous.
Trump has utterly failed this country.
Country over party. Democracy over demagogues. I'm endorsing Kamala Harris.

timeline.event: Elected to U.S. House of Representatives

timeline.significance: One of 10 House Republicans to vote for impeachment after January 6
One of two Republicans on the committee
Crossed party lines to oppose Trump

credibility.background: U.S. Representative, Lieutenant Colonel in Air Force Reserve, served on January 6 Committee, veteran of Iraq and Afghanistan

oppositionReasons: Trump incited the January 6 attack on the Capitol
Trump is a threat to democracy
Trump is weak and lacks moral character
Trump has corrupted the Republican Party
Trump prioritizes personal power over country
endorsement: Endorsed Kamala Harris for President in 2024

sources.title: List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
